pages.title: Mutation
pages.text: Mutation transforms ordinary materials into magical variants using a catalyst. Use it on a block for a single change, or channel it through a Morphora flower to affect an area.

pages.title: Mutavis
pages.text: $(bold)Direct$(): use on a compatible block to mutate it.$(br)$(bold)Area$(): apply to a Morphora flower to mutate blocks in a radius.$(br)Consumed on use.

pages.title: Mutavis Recipe
pages.text: The catalyst consumed by Mutation. Use on blocks, or feed to a Morphora for an area effect.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: $(li)Direct: target block converts to its mutated form.$(br)$(li)Area: Morphora spreads mutation nearby.$(br)$(li)Some groups cycle (e.g., stones).

pages.title: Flora Mutations (1/2)
pages.text: $(li)Blue Orchid → Spirit Bloom$(br)$(li)Kelp → Siren Kelp$(br)$(li)Tulips (any) → Celestial Bloom$(br)$(li)Brown Mushroom → Dreamshroom

pages.title: Flora Mutations (2/2)
pages.text: $(li)Fern → Ghost Fern$(br)$(li)Lily Pad → Lotus Flower$(br)$(li)Cactus → Saltsprout

pages.title: Other Mutations
pages.text: $(li)Dripstone Block → Tuff$(br)$(li)Ice → Blue Ice$(br)$(li)Sand → Red Sand$(br)$(li)Clay → Mud$(br)$(li)Snow Block → Packed Ice$(br)$(li)Netherrack → Blackstone$(br)$(li)Dirt → Rooted Dirt → Podzol

pages.title: Mutavis Recipe
pages.text: The catalyst consumed by Mutation. Use on blocks, or feed to a Morphora for an area effect.
